Prev: Timothy discovering that snow is cold Up: Spring Break in Mammoth Next: From the condo balcony

Swimming pool and icicles



The pool itself was closed for winter, but the hot tub was open and very popular.
Taken Sunday, March 24, 2002, 04:42:07pm.  Original image size: 1200x1600, 1.0Mb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/40s @ F5.6, ISO 100, 128mm
